entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reopen of #40132 #40292
  • Go-to-definition in C# files on Razor generated code does not bring me to .razor file #40290
    Backlog
  • Custom icon is not getting set in visual studio 2019 #40289
  • Blazor documentation needs additional real usage examples for settings #40288
  • When Consuming Razor Class Library Project it is very cumbersome to get the Right RCL Project Name for the Static Resource #40287
  • Add support for passing Metadata Seed to the underlying oidc-client in WASM Authentication #40286
  • Identity: email confirmation codes are case sensitive #40285
  • Some Blazor WebAssembly DLLs are quarantined by anti-virus #40283
  • Razor in CSS preprocessor support #40281
  • Visual Studio for mac 运行 net6 mvc 时,The view '···' was not found. #40280
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation Error #40291

Closed

  • Investigate why SingleFileExe tests fail in Helix #25103
    7.0-preview3
  • HotReload displays WebSocket connection error message in browser console for ASP.NET Core app run in VS2022 but not on dotnet watch run #40264
  • WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures is null #40042
    7.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40180
  • VS Code: After installing .net 7.0, open a mvc6.0 project and encounter a warning: "Dereference of a possibly null reference." #40282
  • Razor runtime compilation doesnt work second time with virtual file path providers? #40012
  • Signalr hub inject service #40112
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are often recreated #39053
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Virtualize component's Items property should be IReadOnlyCollection #40247
  • BACKROUND SERVICE IN ASP.NET CORE #40266
  • Can't Use IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync to Call JavaScript Arrow Function #40258
  • Blazor UI Events not firing in SPA in Site Path #40246

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Polly to 7.2.3 #40284
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update url-parse #40277
    area-signalr, area-blazor

Merged

  • Re-enable SingleFileExe #39977
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #40183
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Ensure `AccessToken` is not trimmed away #40274
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • In diffing, optimize unkeyed frames after keyed frames #40261
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Update branding to preview3 #40276
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Added the FabricBot configuration file #40278
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • React to runtime nullability changes #40268
    area-identity, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Annotate Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal for nullability #40269
    area-blazor
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • Support OpenAPI summaries and descriptions on minimal endpoints #40088
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/3.1] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40220
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/6.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40217
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
